name: nfci
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0

stmt.origin: mpgbir(s1, wnfc(s0, c0), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
stmt.pretty: mpgbir(s1, F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, s1 ∈ c0))

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wal(s1, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
-| wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wal(s1, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
-| wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wal(s1, wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: Deduce that a class ` A ` does not have ` x ` free in it. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
